<extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is an important signaling and activation Ag found on certain bone marrow - derived cells .
Recently , <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> also has been shown to be expressed by mesenchymal cells , including human fibroblasts .
Little is known about the role of <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in fibroblasts .

The current study investigates the hypothesis that <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expressed on lung fibroblasts is an activation structure and mechanism for interaction with hemopoietic cells .
Communication between resident tissue fibroblasts and T cells is necessary for normal wound healing , and can be pathologic , resulting in tissue fibrosis .
